Title: Ethnic Minorities Achievement Service (EMAS)
Description: If your child’s first language is not English or if they are from Gypsy, Roma or Traveller heritage the Ethnic Minorities Achievement Service (EMAS) can provide extra support for their education. Our team of teaching staff and family liaison officers work with schools, pupils and…

Title: Health Outreach and Inclusion Service NHS
Description: What we do…The Health Outreach and Inclusion Service tackles health inequalities within the most vulnerable communities in society. Our main function is to support individuals and families, particularly those from disadvantaged groups who often have difficulty accessing Services.  The Service works with vulnerable migrants, gypsies…

Title: Maternity Action
Description: Maternity Action is the UK’s maternity rights charity dedicated to promoting, protecting and enhancing the rights of all pregnant women, new mothers and their families to employment, social security and health care. We empower mums and dads We offer free advice for mums and dads worried…

Title: Support for Wigan Arrivals Project (SWAP)
Description: Support for Wigan Arrivals Project supports asylum seekers and refugees who are living in the Wigan Borough. Our vision is for everyone living in Wigan to feel welcome, to be given an equal chance to build a decent life, and to know where and how…
Location: Penson Street Community Centre, Penson Street, WIGAN, WN1 2LP

Title: Young people from different ethnic backgrounds
Description: If you’re aged 7-18 and have recently come to live in Wigan or Leigh from a different country, you can come and join us. There are two young people’s groups in the borough that are just for young people from different ethnic backgrounds. You can do…
